jobicade.util.geom

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • jobicade.util.geom.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Size

    public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents an immutable 2D point in integer precision, typically in screen pixel space.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Point

        public Point()
        Default constructor for points. Both X and Y will be zero.

      • Point

        public Point(int x,
             int y)
        Constructor for points.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate.
        y - The Y coordinate.

      • Point

        public Point(Point point)
        Copy constructor for points.
        Parameters:
        point - The original point to copy.

      • Point

        public Point(net.minecraft.client.gui.ScaledResolution resolution)
        Conversion constructor from scaled resolutions. Uses the scaled width and height to populate X and Y.
        Parameters:
        resolution - The resolution to get width and height from.

      • zero

        public static Point zero()
        Returns a point with both X and Y equal to zero. Prefer to use this over creating one, as there may be a performance benefit.
        Returns:
        A point with both X and Y equal to zero.
